entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
